item.description:
Low Tide (Plum Island South) - 12:05 PM

High Tide (Plum Island South) - 6:17 PM

Paddle down the Essex river, into Essex Bay, and out to the beaches. We will be stopping for a lunch/swim break so bring water, eats, and a towel. This is the route of the annual Essex River Race.

The Essex Marina charges a launch fee of Â $10.00 per car and $20.00 for a car and trailer.

We will be stopping at a local eatery for a post paddle feast, If you wish to join us, bring some $$ or plastic.

The Distance for this paddle will be around 9 Nautical Miles (10.4 Statute Miles)

This is a Level 2 Paddle open to Kayaks 14' or longer with watertight bulkheads or float bags. Expect wind, waves, strong currents and boat traffic.

As always, you are required to wear a PFD (Life Jacket) when paddling with this group.


Directions:

Click Here For Google Maps Directions To The Essex Marina
item.name: Essex River / Essex Bay
